item.title: Kapil Sharma Was Drunk, Slapped By KRK's Security Guard In Mumbai? SHOCKING Claims Out - News18
item.description:
Kapil Sharma Was Drunk, Slapped By KRK's Security Guard In Mumbai? SHOCKING Claims Out

Date: December 31, 2024 Source: News

Days after Mika Singh's claims, KRK shared his perspective on an incident where Kapil Sharma and Mika Singh allegedly created a disturbance at his home in Mumbai.

  • Mika Singh alleged that Kapil was upset with KRK and went to his residence, leading to a confrontation.
  • KRK stated that both Kapil and Mika were drunk when they attempted to enter his house and were stopped by security.
  • According to KRK, the security guards slapped Kapil and Mika when they refused to leave.
  • Mika later apologized to KRK for the incident, and KRK mentioned roughing up Mika as a warning.
“They were drunk, and were refusing to leave, so my security guards had to slap them,” KRK stated.

This incident highlights the ongoing tensions between the celebrities involved and suggests potential consequences for their actions.

item.title: Baby John box office collection day 7: Varun Dhawan film ends first week with barely any growth, mints over ₹32 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Baby John box office collection day 7: Varun Dhawan film ends first week with barely any growth, mints over ₹32 crore

Date: Dec 31, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Varun Dhawan-starrer 'Baby John' was released on December 25 but has seen a steady decline in box office collections over its first week, managing to mint just over ₹32 crore.

  • The film opened strongly with ₹11.25 crore on its first day.
  • However, a significant drop was observed on the second day with earnings of ₹4.75 crore, marking a 57.78% decline.
  • By the seventh day, the film collected approximately ₹1.81 crore.
  • Overall occupancy in Hindi was reported at 10.68% on December 31.
“Overall, there’s nothing much that makes Baby John stand out apart from the action.”

The film, directed by Kalees and features other actors like Keerthy Suresh and Jackie Shroff, tells the story of a police officer who must confront his past to protect his daughter. Despite its mixed reviews, the film has struggled to perform well at the box office.

item.title: Max (Kannada) Box Office Collection Day 7 - Sacnilk
item.description:
Max (Kannada) Box Office Collection Day 7

Publication Date: December 31, 2024

Source: Sacnilk

Max (Kannada) performed well on its first 6 days at the box office, earning an estimated ₹ 30.10 Cr. On its seventh day, it earned around ₹ 2.25 Cr India net.

  • Morning Shows: 13.65%
  • Afternoon Shows: 26.58%
  • Evening Shows: 26.54%
  • Night Shows: 28.32%

Disclaimer: The Box Office Data are compiled from various sources and by our own research. These data can be approximate and Sacnilk does not make any claims about the authenticity of the data.

item.title: Karavali teaser centres on a chair, symbol of prestige - DTNEXT
item.description:
Karavali Teaser Centers on a Chair, Symbol of Prestige

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Not specified

The recently released teaser for 'Karavali', directed by Gurudutt Gaaniga and featuring Prajwal Devaraj, revolves around a chair symbolizing prestige.

  • The teaser begins with the impactful dialogue, “It’s not just a chair, it’s a symbol of prestige.”
  • It highlights that those who claim this chair of prestige will face consequences.
  • The film features the traditional buffalo race, Kambala.
  • Besides Prajwal Devaraj, the film stars Sampada, Ramesh Indira, and Mitra.
  • Three distinct looks of Prajwal Devaraj have already been revealed: Yakshagana, Kambala, and Mahishasura-inspired avatars.
  • Gurudatha Ganiga Films backs the project, with music by Sachin Basrur and cinematography by Abhimanyu Sadanandan.
“Those who dare to claim this chair of prestige won’t be spared.”

This film promises intense visuals and engaging dialogues centered around themes of power and tradition.

item.title: Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here’s what we know! - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here’s what we know!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor and acclaimed director Sujoy Ghosh are reportedly aligning their schedules to collaborate on a new thriller project, although no official confirmation has been made yet.

  • Shahid and Sujoy are prioritizing their schedules to bring the project to fruition.
  • A source indicated that Shahid had previously shown interest in the script, but timing was an issue.
  • The project promises a suspenseful narrative, reflecting Sujoy Ghosh's filmmaking style.
  • Shahid Kapoor's recent works include the digital series Farzi and the film Bloody Daddy.
  • His next film, Deva, is set for release on January 31, 2025.
“Shahid was interested in the script earlier, but the timing wasn’t right. Now, both Sujoy and he are making it a priority to align their schedules and bring it to life.”

The speculation continues as Shahid's team has denied any current negotiations for a new film with Sujoy Ghosh, creating anticipation among fans for what might come next.

item.title: Ethnic co-ord sets perfect for New Year parties ft. Bollywood celebs - The Times of India
item.description:
Ethnic Co-ord Sets Perfect for New Year Parties Featuring Bollywood Celebrities

Publication Date: Dec 31, 2024 Source: Times of India

New Year parties are the perfect occasion to flaunt traditional wear, and Bollywood divas serve as great style inspirations for co-ord sets that blend elegance with tradition.

  • Bollywood stars like Priyanka Chopra, Katrina Kaif, and Kiara Advani showcased stunning ethnic outfits.
  • Priyanka Chopra wore a fashionable dhoti-like skirt with an off-shoulder blouse.
  • Katrina Kaif donned a flared orange skirt paired with an intricately embroidered jacket.
  • Aditi Rao Hydari was seen in a vibrant pink skirt with a dramatic cape.
  • Shilpa Shetty impressed in a teal green dhoti skirt featuring a flowy printed cape.
  • Kriti Sanon brought a fiery look in red with a body-hugging skirt and mirror detailing.
  • Rakul Preet opted for a regal green palazzo with a matching top and long cape.
  • Sonakshi Sinha blended modernity with tradition in a dark blue palazzo and cape.
“New Year parties always call for cocktails gowns and party dresses, but all the newlywed ladies who wish to celebrate their New Year bash with their in-laws deserve to look stylish.”

This season, let the glamour of Bollywood inspire your New Year attire and embrace the chic ethnic co-ord sets to celebrate the festivities.

item.title: VidaaMuyarchi isn’t your regular mass entertainer: Magizh Thirumeni - DTNEXT
item.description:
Magizh Thirumeni discusses Ajith's VidaaMuyarchi as a Unique Film Experience

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

With the release of Ajith's VidaaMuyarchi approaching, director Magizh Thirumeni clarifies that the film is not a typical mass action entertainer but rather a relatable story about a common man facing challenges.

  • The film diverges from expectations by focusing on a common man's struggles rather than a larger-than-life hero.
  • Magizh mentions that this is the first film he directed without having written it himself, allowing for creative collaboration.
  • Trisha and Arjun join Ajith in the cast, with Regina playing a significant antagonistic role.
  • Music by Anirudh Ravichander has been well received, contributing to the film's anticipation.
  • The film was shot in Azerbaijan, adding to its unique storyline.
“As the director of the film, I would want the audience to know that this film is not their regular, mass action entertainer.” - Magizh Thirumeni

The film promises to provide a fresh perspective within the action genre, challenging both the director and the audience.

item.title: Girl Crush Player 196 From "Squid Game 2" Looks Unrecognizable Starring In K-Drama "The Glory" - Koreaboo
item.description:
Girl Crush Player 196 From 'Squid Game 2' Looks Unrecognizable Starring In K-Drama 'The Glory'

Date: 6 hours ago | Source: Koreaboo

This article discusses the impact of Player 196 from Squid Game 2, portrayed by Song Ji Woo, who captivated fans despite her brief role.

  • Player 196, portrayed by Song Ji Woo, garnered significant attention from fans.
  • She interacted notably with other characters, particularly T.O.P.
  • Her demise in the first game led to disappointment among viewers.
  • Song Ji Woo also featured in the popular K-Drama The Glory, where she played a younger version of a lead character.
“Player 196 shoulda had more screen time…” - embee 🕺🏻

This highlights Ji Woo's growing recognition in the K-drama scene, showcasing her versatility and talent.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 26: Allu Arjun’s Sequel Surpasses Every Single Most Profitable Hindi Film Of Last 2 Years Except 3! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 26: Allu Arjun’s Sequel Surpasses Every Single Most Profitable Hindi Film

Date: December 30, 2024Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun is clearly the man of the year, with Pushpa 2 roaring at the box office with its Hindi version. In 26 days, the film stands at a massive 775.50 crore total coming from the Hindi version. The individual profit from the Hindi version alone stands at 287.75%.

  • The film delivered the second biggest Day 26 collection in Hindi cinema history, earning 6.65 crore on its Day 26.
  • Pushpa has surpassed the lifetime collection of Jawan’s Hindi version.
  • On December 30, the fourth Monday, Pushpa earned 5.5 crore despite a drop from the previous day's 12.25 crore.
  • Week-wise breakdown shows a total collection of 775.75 crore after 4 weeks.
“With this figure, Pushpa 2 has surpassed the profits registered by every single Hindi film in the last 2 years except 3.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 continues to perform impressively at the box office, cementing its status among the most profitable Hindi films.

item.title: Photo Moment: Ram Charan being playful with Balakrishna on Unstoppable show - 123telugu
item.description:
Photo Moment: Ram Charan being playful with Balakrishna on Unstoppable show

Published on Dec 31, 2024 7:09 pm IST

Ram Charan recently made an appearance on Nandamuri Balakrishna’s Unstoppable show to promote his film Game Changer. A delightful moment captured, showcasing the camaraderie between the actors, has gone viral online.

  • Ram Charan showcased a rustic look with a thick beard and long hair.
  • The episode will feature surprises including a phone conversation with a top hero.
  • Game Changer's producer Dil Raju will also appear on the episode.
  • Exclusive content from the film will be revealed during the show.
  • The episode is set to premiere on Aha soon.
“Charan’s rustic look is now going viral on the internet.”

This engaging episode promises a mix of fun and exclusive insights about Game Changer, reinforcing the significant chemistry between these beloved stars.

item.title: Live Updates | Happy New Year 2025 Celebrations: Countdown To Cheers, Joy, And Fresh Beginnings - Zee News
item.description:
Happy New Year 2025 Live Updates

Publication Date: December 31, 2024
Source: Zee News

As 2024 draws to a close, we stand on the cusp of a brand-new year, ready to welcome 2025 with open arms, symbolizing fresh opportunities and new beginnings.

  • New Year's Day falls on January 1, 2025, which is a Wednesday.
  • The celebrations feature dazzling fireworks and public gatherings in cities around the world.
  • Famous events include the Ball Drop in New York with performances from popular artists.
  • Global cities illuminate the skies with firework displays.
“This transition brings a sense of hope and renewal.”

The arrival of 2025 is marked by celebrations across India and worldwide, gathering people to reflect on the past year and set aspirations for the future.

item.title: Anurag Kashyap disgusted with Bollywood; plans to leave Mumbai, Salman Khan's 'O O Jaane Jaana' performan - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Anurag Kashyap Disgusted with Bollywood; Plans to Leave Mumbai

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Anurag Kashyap, a prominent filmmaker, has expressed his disgust with the Bollywood industry and announced plans to leave Mumbai, citing various grievances and frustrations with the film industry.

  • Kashyap has been vocal about his discontent regarding the direction of Bollywood.
  • The filmmaker plans to relocate, hinting at a broader disillusionment with industry practices.
  • In entertainment news, Salman Khan's performance of 'O O Jaane Jaana' in Jamnagar has captivated audiences.
Anurag Kashyap stated, "I can’t bear this industry’s condition any longer. It’s heartbreaking."

The current climate in Bollywood has raised concerns among filmmakers and actors about creativity and integrity.

item.title: Horoscope Today LIVE Updates on December 31, 2024 : Numerology says 2025 is a year 9: Here's what it means for your career, love and health front - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Horoscope Today LIVE Updates on December 31, 2024: Numerology says 2025 is a year 9

Publication Date: December 31, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

This live blog offers insights on how the stars and numerology shape your day on December 31, 2024, and what to expect in 2025.

  • Numerology for 2025 sums to the number 9, symbolizing endings, personal growth, and helping others.
  • Astrological predictions provide guidance on love, career, and health for each zodiac sign.
  • Specific zodiac signs are highlighted for financial luck and opportunities in 2025.
"As we turn the Georgian calendar's page from 2024 to 2025, the cosmic energies will influence each of us uniquely."

This year marks significant transitions, promising personal growth and reflection.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan's London house is as luxurious and striking as Mannat, see viral pictures - Bollywood Life
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan's Luxurious London House Goes Viral

Published: December 31 2024, 18:25 PM IST

Shah Rukh Khan fans will be amazed to see how luxurious his house in London looks like. The photos have been going viral on social media. Check them out.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE BUZZ: Yash in talks with 20th Century Fox for International Distribution of Toxic; December 2025 release - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Yash Negotiates with 20th Century Fox for 'Toxic's' International Release in December 2025

Published on December 31, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Yash is in preliminary discussions with 20th Century Fox regarding the international distribution of his upcoming film 'Toxic', set to release in December 2025.

  • The film is directed by National Award-winner Geethu Mohandas.
  • It features Kiara Advani and Nayanthara in lead roles.
  • 'Toxic' aims to be a global project with multiple language releases including Kannada, Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, and Malayalam.
  • Closure on the distribution deal is expected by Summer 2025.
  • The film is set in the post-Independence era, showcasing Yash in a new avatar.
“The discussions are in very nascent stages but the intent is to make Toxic a global project.”

The film 'Toxic' is highly anticipated, and updates will continue to be provided on Pinkvilla regarding its progress and other projects involving Yash.

item.title: Buzz: Game Changer trailer launch delayed - 123telugu
item.description:
Buzz: Game Changer Trailer Launch Delayed

Published on: Dec 31, 2024 6:04 pm IST

The trailer for the upcoming film Game Changer, starring Ram Charan, has been delayed. Initially set for release on January 1, 2025, it is now expected to drop on January 2, 2025.

  • Fans made headlines by erecting a 256-ft. cutout of Ram Charan in Vijayawada.
  • Producer Dil Raju emphasized the importance of getting the trailer right.
  • The movie features SJ Suryah as the antagonist and plans for promotional events are underway.
“Lately, a film’s box office prospects are wholly dependent on the trailer cut. Hence, we are taking time to get things right.” - Dil Raju

The delay in the trailer's release has created anticipation, and the production team is expected to make an official announcement soon.

item.title: Horoscope for 2025: Yearly prediction for each zodiac sign - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Horoscope for 2025: Yearly prediction for each zodiac sign

Date & Source: December 31, 2024, Hindustan Times

As we enter 2025, cosmic energies will uniquely influence each zodiac sign. Astrologer Kyle Thomas predicts 'major new beginnings' and personal growth throughout the year.

  • Aries will embrace their true self and focus on personal desires and relationships.
  • Taurus can expect surprises and opportunities for personal growth.
  • Gemini’s luck peaks in the first half, emphasizing proactive goal-setting.
  • Cancer shines with possibilities to manifest goals mid-year.
  • Leo should plan for growth through learning and new experiences.
  • Virgo enters a transformative cycle centered on identity and fulfillment.
  • Libra faces significant changes, embracing new experiences and relationships.
  • Scorpio will reflect and seek adventure, enhancing wealth matters.
  • Sagittarius focuses on relationship growth and home communication.
  • Capricorn anticipates transitions, ultimately improving personal and professional responsibilities.
  • Aquarius begins radical life changes, focusing on desires and opportunities.
  • Pisces will work hard and shift focus to home and family dynamics.

item.title: Sonu Sood offers prayers at Golden temple ahead of the release of his directorial debut Fateh - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sonu Sood Offers Prayers at Golden Temple Ahead of the Release of His Directorial Debut Fateh

Date: December 31, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Sonu Sood recently made a heartfelt visit to the Golden Temple in Amritsar, Punjab, ahead of the release of his much-anticipated directorial debut, 'Fateh'.

  • The actor shared a video of his visit on social media with a spiritual message.
  • 'Fateh', directed by Sood, is set to release on January 10, 2025, addressing cybercrime.
  • Sood described his directorial journey as a process driven by passion and purpose.
  • The film features a star-studded cast, including Jacqueline Fernandez and Naseeruddin Shah.
  • In preparation for the film’s release, Sood also visited the Mahakaleshwar Temple for blessings.
“Stepping into the director's chair for the first time with Fateh has been a journey of passion and purpose.” - Sonu Sood

This visit underscores Sood's commitment to honoring his roots and the significance of spirituality in his professional journey.

item.title: Netflix Hits Jackpot: Producers Strike Gold - M9
item.description:
Netflix Hits Jackpot: Producers Strike Gold

Publication Date: December 20, 2024
Source: M9 News

The film ‘Marco’ has achieved unprecedented success, becoming Malayalam cinema’s highest-grossing Hindi-dubbed film and securing Netflix's digital rights.

  • Released on December 20, 2024, 'Marco' has broken multiple records.
  • Received positive response from both Malayalam and Hindi audiences.
  • Set to release in Telugu on January 1st and Tamil on January 3rd.
  • Netflix acquired digital rights due to the film's pan-India popularity.
  • Described as ‘India’s most violent film’ due to its intense action.
“Netflix’s move has been driven by Marco’s success; it would have thrown them out had they approached it earlier.”

‘Marco’ represents an unexpected success story in Malayalam cinema, highlighting the growing influence of regional films in mainstream media.

item.title: Fashion Trends 2024: Power dressing, seasonless wardrobes, and the evolving bridal aesthetic - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Fashion Trends 2024: Power Dressing and Evolving Bridal Aesthetics

Publication Date: March 2024
Source: CNBC TV18

Fashion in 2024 is marked by the blend of innovation and tradition, emphasizing individuality and purpose. The evolution of power dressing continues as women seek versatile wardrobe options.

  • Women embrace versatile, seasonless clothing.
  • Bridal fashion combines modernity and romance with earthy tones.
  • Elevated basics and timeless pieces are on the rise.
  • Post-pandemic weddings prioritize comfort and personal expression.
  • Grooms are moving beyond traditional black tuxedos to explore a variety of styles.
  • Accessories become significant in enhancing individual looks.
“Women are seeking clothing that seamlessly transitions between their professional and personal lives,” - Rupanshi Aggarwal

The shift towards seasonless wardrobes and innovative bridal aesthetics reflects a larger movement in fashion towards comfort and individual expression while celebrating timeless elegance.

item.title: Anil Kapoor recaps 2024 as a year of ‘grit, grind and growth’ - DTNEXT
item.description:
Anil Kapoor recaps 2024 as a year of ‘grit, grind and growth’

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Bollywood actor Anil Kapoor reflects on 2024, describing it as a year defined by 'grit, grind, and growth.' He shares insights on purpose and perseverance in his personal and professional life as he looks forward to 2025.

  • Kapoor emphasizes the importance of setting bolder aspirations and embracing the new year.
  • He shared a video on Instagram highlighting cherished moments and film highlights from 2024.
  • Notable films in 2024 include “Fighter” and “The Crew.”
  • Upcoming film “Subedaar” will explore themes of civilian life and societal issues.
  • Kapoor will also star in “War 2” and “Alpha” next.
“2024 was all about grit, grind, and growth. Purpose and perseverance have always led my way, and I aim to be intentional about amping the energy up and dreaming bigger... Let’s rage 2025!”

Kapoor had a successful year in both personal and professional aspects, poised for an energetic start to 2025.

item.title: BJP MP Tejasvi Surya to marry Carnatic singer Sivasri Skandaprasad - The Federal
item.description:
BJP MP Tejasvi Surya to Marry Carnatic Singer Sivasri Skandaprasad

Publication Date: December 31, 2024 | Source: The Federal

Tejasvi Surya, the BJP MP from Bangalore South, is set to marry Carnatic singer and Bharatanatyam dancer Sivasri Skandaprasad on March 4, 2025. Both families have yet to make an official announcement.

  • Surya is an advocate for fitness and the first Indian MP to complete the Ironman 70.3 triathlon.
  • Sivasri Skandaprasad has multiple academic credentials and a popular YouTube channel.
  • She performed a Kannada devotional song that was praised by Prime Minister Modi.
“Efforts like Skandaprasad’s help preserve India’s rich cultural heritage.” - Prime Minister Narendra Modi

This marriage marks a significant union between two prominent figures in their respective fields, celebrating both cultural heritage and contemporary achievements.

item.title: Massive ticket rate hikes for Sankranthi releases in Andhra Pradesh - 123telugu
item.description:
Massive Ticket Rate Hikes for Sankranthi Releases in Andhra Pradesh

Published on Dec 31, 2024 4:00 pm IST

The Andhra Pradesh government has announced significant ticket price hikes for upcoming Sankranthi film releases, affecting major films like Ram Charan's Game Changer, Balakrishna's Daaku Maharaaj, and Venkatesh's Sankranthiki Vasthunam.

  • Game Changer's ticket prices will increase by Rs. 135 in single screens and Rs. 175 in multiplexes, with a steep hike of Rs. 600 for benefit shows after 1 AM.
  • Daaku Maharaaj will see an increase of Rs. 110 in single screens and Rs. 135 in multiplexes, with benefit shows from 4 AM seeing a hike of Rs. 500.
  • Sankranthiki Vasthunam's rates will increase by Rs. 75 and Rs. 100 respectively for single screens and multiplexes.
“massive hikes will be allowed for all three films, openings will be huge in Andhra Pradesh”

The price hikes are expected to lead to a strong opening for these films as audiences flock to theaters for the Sankranthi celebrations.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut on shooting with 'chaotic' Bigg Boss 18 contestants; says ‘Bade naatak kiye inn logon ne’ - The Times of India
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut on shooting with 'chaotic' Bigg Boss 18 contestants; says ‘Bade naatak kiye inn logon ne’

Publication Date: Not available Source: Times of India

Kangana Ranaut shares her thoughts on working with contestants from Bigg Boss 18, describing the environment as chaotic and filled with theatrical performances.

  • Kangana highlights the unpredictability of the Bigg Boss 18 contestants.
  • She comments on their behavior, indicating they are putting on a show for attention.
  • The actress expresses her experiences on the set, noting both challenges and humorous moments.
“Bade naatak kiye inn logon ne,” says Kangana regarding the contestants' antics.

This insight into Kangana's filming experience reveals the challenges faced while working in such a dynamic environment.

item.title: Year-Ender 2024: Top Female Global Fashion Icons Of 2024 | Filmfare.com - Filmfare
item.description:
Year-Ender 2024: Top Female Global Fashion Icons Of 2024

Date: December 2024 | Source: Filmfare.com

2024 saw a plethora of stunning fashion statements from top female icons, as they walked runways and red carpets alike, leaving a mark in the world of fashion.

  • Alia Bhatt dazzled in a mint-green Sabyasachi saree at MET Gala.
  • Aishwarya Rai wowed in a red gown at Paris Fashion Week.
  • Jennie Kim made headlines with her minimalist yet chic fashion choices.
  • Sabrina Carpenter impressed at Vanity Fair's Oscars party with her unique style.
  • Beyoncé showcased stunning outfits during her halftime performance.
  • The Kardashians continued to dominate with their luxurious looks.
  • Zendaya captivated audiences with her diverse fashion statements.
“These women are turning heads, sparking trends, and etching their names in the global fashion hall of fame.”

This year’s icons prove that fashion transcends borders and is truly an art form, celebrating individuality and creativity in style.

item.title: Tannaz Irani says she was ‘immature, callous’ for walking out on her daughter after divorce: ‘It was very painful, unsettling for her’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Tannaz Irani says she was ‘immature, callous’ for walking out on her daughter after divorce: ‘It was very painful, unsettling for her’

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: The Indian Express

Tannaz Irani opened up about her relationship with her daughter, Zianne, discussing the pain caused by her decision to leave after her divorce. She acknowledged her past immaturity and the unsettling effects of her actions on her daughter.

  • Tannaz Irani was just 20 when she married her first husband, leading to a complicated relationship with her daughter.
  • She described her actions as 'painful and unsettling' for her daughter, who is now 32.
  • In a podcast, Tanaaz reflected on her past and expressed regret over her 'callous' decisions.
  • She has since reconciled with her daughter and acknowledges her growth and understanding of family dynamics.
“It was very painful for her. Especially at a time when divorces were not big at all. I was very immature, not understanding the bigger picture at that time.” - Tannaz Irani

Tannaz Irani emphasizes the importance of communication and guidance in parenting, reflecting on her missteps in the past and expressing hope for the future of her relationship with her daughter.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 31, 2024 predicts hard wor will pay off - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 31, 2024

Date: December 31, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Aquarius horoscope for today emphasizes hard work and commitment in relationships and career, leading to positive results despite minor challenges.

  • The daily horoscope encourages commitment to work and careful handling of wealth and health.
  • Relationship issues may arise but can be resolved through communication.
  • Professional challenges are anticipated but may result in appreciation from superiors.
  • Health is generally stable with minor concerns noted.
"Do not let risks pressure you. Give the best in love. Your health will be normal."

Overall, the day suggests maintaining effort and focus across different areas of life for positive outcomes.

item.title: Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, December 31, 2024 predicts a healthy lifestyle - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, December 31, 2024 to know your astrological predictions. Control the expenditure.

Date: December 31, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

This daily horoscope emphasizes the importance of managing expenditures and maintaining healthy relationships. Capricorns are encouraged to focus on their personal and professional lives while staying cautious with finances.

  • Capricorns should ensure their lovers are happy while managing any official challenges.
  • Financial discipline is advised to avoid disputes.
  • Minor health concerns can arise, but consulting a doctor is recommended.
  • Career responsibilities may increase, but success is likely if approached sincerely.
"Control the expenditure and focus on your health."

This horoscope serves as a reminder for Capricorns to find balance in their lives and relationships while being mindful of their overall well-being.

item.title: Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 30, 2024 predicts raising funds in business - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, December 31, 2024

Published on: Dec 31, 2024 01:16 PM IST Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope predicts a favorable day for Scorpios regarding finances and work, emphasizing a positive attitude and good health.

  • Positive financial outlook; no major monetary issues.
  • Successful day in professional life with opportunities to showcase talents.
  • Focus on communication to ensure smooth relationships in personal life.
  • Health remains strong but caution is advised for viral infections.
"You will be able to repay the loans and will also receive foreign funds, especially in business transactions."

Overall, Scorpios can expect a rewarding day that enhances both personal and professional aspects of their lives.

item.title: Laid-off graphic designer with 14 years of experience turns autorickshaw driver to make ends meet - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Laid-off Graphic Designer Becomes Autorickshaw Driver in Mumbai

Date: Dec 31, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

A Mumbai-based graphic designer with 14 years of experience turned to driving an autorickshaw after facing layoffs and numerous job rejections. His journey, shared on LinkedIn, highlights the struggles of unemployment and the resilience needed to pivot careers.

  • Kamlesh Kamtekar, former assistant creative manager, faced multiple job rejections after extensive networking and submitting résumés.
  • Companies often rejected him due to salary expectations exceeding their budgets.
  • Kamtekar chose to start his own business rather than accept low-paying offers, deciding to drive an autorickshaw.
  • His story received considerable empathy and encouragement from netizens, highlighting a widespread concern about underappreciated talent.
“It’s heartbreaking to see talent like this go unrecognised. Wishing you the best in your new journey.”

This poignant story illustrates the harsh realities of job markets for skilled professionals and the brave choices some make in the face of adversity.
